review_title: Great Formula. The Color Doesn't Work For Me
review_content:
The formula of this blush is beautiful. It is smooth and not too powdery. There is subtle sheen in the powders, so it doesn't look completely flat on cheeks. Also, it lasts pretty well on my combination oily skin, about 7 hours for a regular office day. The only issue I have with this blush is the color. Havana is described as rose. It looks pretty cool toned in the pan, and that's why I purchased this. But on my cheeks it appears way too warm for my liking (I have medium olive skin tone). So I decided to return it.

review_title: Great Formula. Color Doesn't Work For Me.
review_content:
The formula of this blush is beautiful. It is smooth and not too powdery. There is subtle sheen in the powders, so it doesn't look completely flat on cheeks. Also, it lasts pretty well on my combination oily skin, about 7 hours for a regular office day. The only issue I have with this blush is the color. Seychelles is described as bronze. On my medium olive skin tone, this doesn't show up much color but the "sheen finish" is very obvious. It looks kind of weird. So I decided to return this blush. But if you have fair to light-to-medium (NC25 or below) skin tone, you will probably like this blush.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I've tried blush a very long time ago and I hated it. As a fair skinned person, I had a lot of redness that I was trying to hide if anything and was happy with just a bronzer. But then I thought of giving blush another chance by using it in a smart way, by choosing something that suits me better. I've looked like a clown before, but I figured trying the new tan/sunburn look thing would be nice and you wouldn't be able to notice as much when I went naturally red. So according to many reviews what was appealing was the longevity (100% true, otherwise whats the point?) and the slight glow from the products (also 100% true) This colour seems like a bronzer online but in person its the perfect sunkissed colour and I think it is a flattering versatile shade for various skin tones. I have a million freckles and have decided to embrace them and now prefer to wear light to no coverage (maybe conceal blemishes and undereyes) and focus on my skin looking at smooth and natural looking/flawless as possible. NOW let me tell you why this is the best makeup product I have ever purchased. I wear this with and put mascara on and I look even better than if I were to cake on a bunch of makeup like I used to. Cause this adds the beautiful sunkissed pop of colour like I mentioned. It adds a natural looking highlight from it's shear glowiness. And lastly it contours my face somehow (a tad of bronziness). I've never seen anything like it nor loved a makeup product as much. Everyone says this but I really don't write reviews, I just had to share my new secret weapon.
…read more

review_title: will never need to try another blush
review_content:
10/10 sensational. Blend easily and lasts longer than any blush I’ve tried. Buildable & natural looking (not too matte or too shimmery). So happy with Dolly & Seychelles on my medium complexion! Can’t wait to buy another one. I never leave reviews but I’ll never buy another blush again. I was a die-hard for Milani baked blushes but those don’t last on the skin nearly as long as these. The product itself is quite small but you don’t need a lot; I’ve been using very consistently for 3 months and they still look new. Also think this is reasonably priced. Would love for Buxom to launch a palette of these!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content:
Depending on your tastes and skin tone, these blushes are very pigmented. It reminds me of the cheap makeup in the 90s where you would end up looking so overdone. If that is your vibe, you will love these. If you like blush to be very apparent from the first touch, this is your jam. I personally prefer a more delicate product that I can build up, that style appears the most lit-from-within for me and my preferences. I gave 4 stars because the quality of the product is nice, from the compact to the blendability. The color is WAY TOO STRONG for me but that is more my preference that a product defect, if that makes sense. I think the product is fine it is just not for me. I am even considering de-cluttering these at some point because of how little I use them. It is hard to rate products when you don't like them as a matter of taste rather than product short-comings.

review_content:

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Red', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content:
I recently decided that I needed something to extend the wear of my liquid blush, Ilia Color Haze Multi-Use Pigment. I use two different shades, depending on the undertone of my makeup. I use Before Today—Dusty Mauve for pinkish days, and Waking Up—Warm Nude for peachy days. Problem was that in humid East Coast air, my blush didn’t last long. I don’t like to use primers on my face, so the color sort of slides off in the damp heat. I decided to use a powder blush along with Ilia’s Color Haze, to keep the color alive. Buxom Wanderlust, which is sort of a cream-to-powder blush, seemed like a good choice. I purchased the pinkish shade, Ibiza, and used it underneath the Ilia liquid pigment in a beautiful rosy mauve shade, Before Today. Wow! The effect is beautiful going on, and it doesn’t evaporate or melt down in the wet heat. This is because Buxom wisely infused this Wanderlust Blush with primer! Rather brilliant. Now I have dimensional, gorgeous color on my face, and it looks clean, smooth, and natural. Best of all, it’s blush that lasts!! It holds true for at least 6-8 hours before needing a little refresh. The Wanderlust Primer-Infused Blush lets me apply lovely, lasting color that stays put, without having to use primer on my entire face. Thanks to the good, ingenious people at Buxom for creating a cosmetic equation for gorgeous face color: Blush Infused Primer = Perfection.
…read more

user_specs: ['Age over 54', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I have these in all colors except Ibiza. Seychelles is a nice pink bronze. I have nothing like this in my collection. Mykonos (peach) works well on my light to medium skin with warm undertones. Normally peach blushes don’t look good on me. I use a stippling blush on the rest of the shades because they are very pigmented. It also gives me a perfect glow so no need to wear a highlighter.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Red', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Absolutely love this entire blush line. This just happens to be my favorite shade. It truly lasts all day. Blush is usually the first thing to wear off the face during the day, and this truly doesn’t budge. The colors are beautiful and the pay off is amazing. 100% recommend the entire line.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Love this blush! I have dark olive skin and this give a gorgeous color. Little goes a long way.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: I own all but Goa of these, they have become my ONLY blush!! smooth, highly pigmented and lats as long as you want it to! I hope they make a brownish burgundy and deeper peach the brights are beautiful and rew deeper more fall winter would be nice. Goa is the only one I returned , it is a very bright berry and too much for my medium skin tone. Be VERY light handed and add as you choose.

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_title: Every single shade is a knock out!
review_content:
mykonos is probably my favorite as someone who loves coral, peach colours but literally all of the colours are amazing. very pigmented so please only dip your blush brush in once for shades like Goa! with colours like Seychelles you can dip a few times because the colour isn't as intense. the smell isn't my favorite but it disappears after you put it on so that's fine. I bought the entire collection and don't think I'll ever need another blush ever again. these actually last the whole day unlike most other powder blushes

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: This is the best powder blush i have ever used, everything in it is amazing, from the texture to the smell, the pigmentation, PLUS it blends perfectly! I got this shade mykonos in january, can't wait to try more colors!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
Holy crap, this is so lovely! I actually got this as a sample at first, one of those little flat cardboard things. That ONE LITTLE SAMPLE lasted me weeks!!! I think it still has product left; it was just so good that I absolutely had to purchase the full size. It only takes one light little dip into this stuff to have enough product for both cheeks. It's really easy to overdo it, but it's also easy enough to tone down with a little more setting powder. I'm quite pale, and this is a bright coral on me. It lasts all freaking day, unlike many other blushes that just vanish after like an hour. Highly recommend!

user_specs: ['Age 35-44', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I absolutely love these blushes and have Havana, Seychelles and Mykonos. They are pigmented, incredibly blendable and are one of the few blushes that give a beautiful glow instead of leaving noticeable glitter on the face. I have very fair, cool toned skin and Havana, a light rose, and Seychelles, a nude shade, are easy to work with. Mykonos, while beautiful, is a much brighter peach than I typically go for so I make sure to use a light hand. All are amazing and although I have a lot or blushes, I keep going back to these. Highly recommend!

review_content: I love love love this blush! I got a sample card of the shades dolly and mykonos and they are just gorgeous. They apply effortlessly and give the cheeks a slight glow. they also last all day long. I had to buy the full size of Dolly because it is just the most beautiful mauve color and looks so great on my skin. Definitely going to pick up a few more shades.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Love the natural look it gives me
review_content: Very pigmented. little goes a long way. You need tiny bit although I found even if I put too much I can easily blend it and it looks very natural. I would say it gives a satin finish and it doesn’t look dry or powdery

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: Ultra pigmented and blends like a dream. A little goes a looong way and I have naturally flush cheeks already so I really have use a minimal amount so it doesn’t appear clownish. Dolly is truly the perfect mauve shade.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_title: BEST BLUSH COLOR AND FORMULA EVER!
review_content: The best blush ever!!! It goes with everything, honestly! It does have a sheen to it, but it doesn’t accentuate any texture on me. It also would need to be built up to be a deeper colored cheek, but I am okay with have the option for just a tint or more!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: Wow a little goes a long way! Love the color and blendability. Not a clue what the priming aspect in this blush is- doesn’t seem to do anything unless that’s what amplifies the pigment. Great sun kissed color!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: This blush definitely stays on all through my 10-12 hour work days and a little goes a long way so this should last awhile. I do think this pink is a little bright and I wish there was this shade, but a tone lighter. Still is a great blush from a brand I like!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: If I could give more than 5 stars, I would. This is the perfect slightly flushed, youthful color for my olive undertone and the texture is so smooth. I was initially concerned it would be shimmery or sparkly, but it just adds a nice radiance to my skin without emphasizing texture. Definitely can be built from sheer to as much color as you'd like. My favorite every day blush

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: Absolutely adore this blush and color. The Mykonos shade is gorgeous and very natural looking. Plus, the scented powder is a very nice touch.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Love this blush . It has a beautiful shimmer to it and keeps my cheeks glowing all day even in the hot sun . Easy to blend .

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: This blush is very beautiful, smells amazing, and is extremely pigmented. I have it in 3 other colors, all of which i love. Get one at least. Warning: be light handed!

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
Seychelles is beautiful. I love that it's a blush you can build up for an extra glam look or make it look super natural. I'm personally not a blush fan myself, but whenever I wear it looks so natural I often get complements that my face is glowing. It's a must have and at only 27 it's a pretty good price. You can't go wrong. I think I'll pick up Mykonos next and this is coming from someone who doesn't really like blush.

review_content: You have to like a shimmery blush to like these. Almost don’t need highlighter because they are so shimmery. Don’t know if they last any longer then regular blush but are really pretty on the skin.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: Don’t walk, RUN to grab this beauty. If you love a glowy blush, this is for you. I love this color because it makes me look like I’m flush from being outside but in the BEST way. I could probably throw away the other 20 blushes in my collection just for this guy. I need all of them!!! For the record, I have Dolly - I don’t know why it won’t let me choose the color :( I have light, cool toned skin with dry skin.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Very pigmented blush, a little on your brush will be just enough. Looks very pretty on the cheek, can probably be used as a eye color if needed.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Favorite blush! I was a longtime fan of Tarte cheek stains, and since they discontinued them, I haven’t found a blush that I loved. Until now. This is crazy pigmented! Use a very light hand when applying. I have Dolly which is a great color for my light complexion, as long as I apply it lightly. The color stays all day. As soon as the other color that I want is restocked, I’ll get that one, too.
